project.name: Universal Factory
project.description: This project is a video game for the PC. This game gets its inspiration from Factorio, Lincity, and RimWorld. It is a 2D civiliation manager. The player must manage their resources and keep their people happy as they progress through a technology tree and make their factories more complex.

reports.report: Researching possible game engines to use.
Currently in the planning phase of this project. This project is a game for PC.
